Please enable Storage Permission in settings to continue
Speed up app launch times and free up space on your phone by vacuuming app database files. Supports SQL databases.

# Clean My Android Pro

Upgrading grants you additional features and supports development.


# Remove Ads

We believe our software can help everyone, so this app is available under a pay-what-you-want model; new features are available for free with ads. The pro upgrade removes ads. Pro users do not view ads.


# Dark Mode

Easy on the eyes. Suitable for darker environments.

![img](https://res.cloudinary.com/tendies/image/upload/v1553987342/cleanmyandroid/pro/screenshot_night_mode.png)

# Support Development

Clean My Android is the result of countless hours of hard work. Regular updates requires a lot of work. In-app purchases help keep us going strong.


# Planned Features

## Scheduled DeviceCleaner

Run DeviceCleaner in the background on a regular interval to keep your Android tidy.


## Scheduled Database Optimizer

Run Database Optimizer in the background on a regular interval to keep your apps launching quickly.

# Clean My Android

All the tools to optimize your Android phone, in one app.

## DiskCleaner
 Remove corpse files leftover by improper app uninstalls.
## Game Booster
 Tips and tricks guaranteed to improve game performance. No gimmicks, only proven techniques to increase FPS, lower phone temperatures, and boost battery life while gaming.
## Antivirus
Comprehensive security with real-time protection, virus scanning, virus remover, and malware cleaner.
## Databases
 Speed up app launch times and free up space on your phone by defragmenting app database files. Supports SQL databases.


## Contributors

This app is created by The Ved.io Group, LLC. Information on data collection & privacy can be found on our privacy policy website. 

This app is made possible by small team of developers, translatorsht, and designers. Major contributors are listed below.

 ![img](https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/46549361?s=460&v=4) 

[timothymiller](https://github.com/timothymiller) 

If you want to support open source software and contribute to Clean My Android, [fork this app on Github](https://github.com/timothymiller/clean-my-android-translations)

There are no shortage of **scam apps that claim to boost the performance of games** by modifying CPU speeds or tweaking RAM settings, but **in reality, do nothing more than show fancy animations**. To make matters worse, most of these apps upload your data offshore and violate your privacy. All the legitimate techniques for boosting game performance and increasing battery life require a little intervention by the user. **Here are a few legitimate ways to improve game FPS & increase battery life.**


# Change GPU rendering mode

One guaranteed way to boost game performance is to change the GPU rendering mode. To do this, we are going to change a hidden setting on your Android.

1. Go to **Settings -> About Phone**
2. Scroll down until you find the Build number section, **tap on Build number 7 times**. A toast message should appear stating **"You are now a developer"**

![Screenshot 1](https://res.cloudinary.com/tendies/image/upload/v1552486673/cleanmyandroid/gamebooster/screenshot1.png)

3. Return to the root Settings menu and scroll down until you see a new field called **Developer options**, tap on it.

![Screenshot 2](https://res.cloudinary.com/tendies/image/upload/v1552486673/cleanmyandroid/gamebooster/screenshot2.png)

4. Find the **Force 4x MSAA option and disable it**. (If you want to decrease jagged lines in games, please enable this setting at a slight hit to performance). 
5. **Disable HW overlays**. This improves performance with older Android games.

![Screenshot 3](https://res.cloudinary.com/tendies/image/upload/v1552486673/cleanmyandroid/gamebooster/screenshot3.png)

6. Reboot your phone.


# Uninstall unwanted apps.

Even though Android apps aren’t open, they can still have background services that consume mobile data, spare CPU cycles, and decrease your standby battery life. Click below to view your apps sorted by usage. Always uninstall the unwanted apps from your phone which will help boost your Android performance.


# Update Software

Developers are always making improvements to their software. The best way to take advantage of these improvements is to keep your software up to date. The steps to check for the most up to date software can vary by device.

1. Go to **Settings -> System**
2. Tap **System Update**


# Avoid Task Killers

The use of task killer apps does more harm than good in the context of battery life and performance. Most apps have background services that will automatically restart upon force-close. Killing these apps with a task killer creates a loop where apps are launched in the background over and over. The best option is to only keep high quality apps on your phone that respect your Android phone battery life and avoid installing task killer apps altogether.


# Turn off Animations

1. Go to **Settings -> Developer Options**
2. Scroll down to find **Window Animation Scale**
3. Set **Window, Transition, and Animator duration to off**

![Screenshot 4](https://res.cloudinary.com/tendies/image/upload/v1552486673/cleanmyandroid/gamebooster/screenshot4.png)
